entry.def: If you pinpoint the cause of something, you discover or explain the cause exactly.

example.ex: It was almost impossible to pinpoint the cause of death.
...if you can pinpoint exactly what the anger is about...
example.tran: 如果你能确切地解释愤怒从何而来

entry.tran: 精确地确定（或指明）…的位置
entry.def: If you pinpoint something or its position, you discover or show exactly where it is.

example.ex: I could pinpoint his precise location on a map...
example.tran: 我能在地图上指明他的准确位置。

example.ex: Computers pinpointed where the shells were coming from.
example.tran: 计算机确定了炮弹发射的位置。

entry.tran: 定点的；定位精确的；非常精确的
entry.def: If something is placed with pinpoint accuracy, it is placed in exactly the right place or position.

example.ex: ...the pinpoint accuracy of the bombing campaigns.
example.tran: 战略性轰炸的精确定位

sentences.sentence: "they were strangers sharing a pinpoint of time together"
"the plane was just a speck in the sky"

means.word_mean: 3. the sharp point of a pin

sentences.sentence: "can you pinpoint the position of the enemy?"
"The chemists could not nail the identity of the chromosome"

auth_sentence.content: With this data, we can easily pinpoint bottlenecks.
auth_sentence.res_content: With this data, we can easily pinpoint bottlenecks.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: With this data, we can easily pinpoint bottlenecks.

auth_sentence.content: Nor do they try for complicated, pinpoint routes.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nor do they try for complicated, pinpoint routes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nor do they try for complicated, pinpoint routes.

auth_sentence.content: It can be difficult to pinpoint just when this happens.
auth_sentence.res_content: It can be difficult to pinpoint just when this happens.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It can be difficult to pinpoint just when this happens.

sentences.en: There is only a pinpoint of light in the cave.
sentences.cn: 山洞中只能见到一丝光线。

means.word_mean: 明确指出，确定（位置或时间）；为…准确定位

sentences.en: Community groups have expressed fears that criminals will be able to analyse suburbs and pinpoint vulnerable house, getaway routes and hiding places.
sentences.cn: 社区组织表达了担忧，他们担心罪犯能够借此分析近郊住宅区的情况，定位容易下手的房屋、逃跑路线以及藏身处。

sentences.en: These missles can be fired with pinpoint accuracy.
sentences.cn: 这些导弹可精确地命中目标。

jushi.english: There is only a pinpoint of light in the cave .
jushi.chinese: 山洞中只能见到一丝光线。

jushi.english: It is not possible to pinpoint precisely the time of death.
jushi.chinese: 准确地确定死亡时间是不可能的。

jushi.english: Our radar has pinpointed the planes.
jushi.chinese: 我们的雷达确定了飞机的精确位置。
